meanings.definition: A unit of currency in Bhutan.
meanings.sent1: In Bhutan, you can use ngultrums to buy souvenirs.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my dollars for ngultrums at the bank.
meanings.sent3: The tourist was amazed by the colorful ngultrums in his wallet.
meanings.sent4: The ngultrums jingled in her purse like tiny bells.
meanings.sent5: The shopkeeper's eyes lit up when he saw the stack of ngultrums.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the currency ngultrum.
meanings.sent1: She counted the ngultrums in her wallet to make sure she had enough.
meanings.sent2: The market only accepted ngultrums as payment.
meanings.sent3: The ngultrums in the cash register seemed to multiply on their own.
meanings.sent4: The ngultrums clinked together like tiny pieces of treasure.
meanings.sent5: The children's eyes widened at the sight of the shiny ngultrums.
